summary.para: Specifies a range of a file that is to be trimmed.

remarks.para: Before the trim operation is passed to the underlying storage system the input ranges are reduced to be aligned to page boundaries (4,096 bytes on 32-bit and x64-based editions of Windows, 8,192 bytes on Itanium-Based editions of Windows).

summary.para: Offset, in bytes, from the start of the file for the range to be trimmed.
Length, in bytes, for the range to be trimmed.
